description: This problem involves the need to classify speckle patterns generated by X-ray detectors in real-time. It is crucial in applications where immediate feedback is necessary, such as in medical imaging or material analysis.
you_have_this_if: You are dealing with high-throughput data from X-ray detectors.
Power consumption is a critical factor in your deployment environment.
You need to frequently update your machine learning models.
You are working with complex speckle patterns that require advanced classification techniques.

approaches.best_for: when you need to perform real-time classification of high-throughput data from X-ray detectors.
approaches.key_tradeoff: This approach offers rapid classification but may require significant tuning for optimal performance.

decision_matrix.best_when: You need to classify speckle patterns in real-time with constraints on power consumption.

start_here: Start with SpeckleNN as it is specifically designed for real-time classification in high-throughput environments, making it suitable for your needs.
